thread.title: Ben Carson Ignites Firestorm Over Confederate Flag Remarks
thread.title_full: Ben Carson Ignites Firestorm Over Confederate Flag Remarks

author: Karoli
title: Ben Carson Ignites Firestorm Over Confederate Flag Remarks
text:
J Maha • 1 min ago 
The Internet may have made a few of us smarter, but it's somehow managed to make a whole lot more even dumber. The Internet is not doing this country any quick favors that I can see. posted on Alabama TV Panel Blasts State's 'Fishy' Plan To Close DMV Offices In Black Communities angryspittle • 1 min ago 
Well I am 48 vintage and am sick that we just fucking rolled over in 2000 and allowed the constitution to be shredded. posted on Alabama TV Panel Blasts State's 'Fishy' Plan To Close DMV Offices In Black Communities Irvgotti-5.0 • 1 min ago 
I hope the events over that last few years have open the eyes of America to the point that black people aren't just making this crap up, things are deliberately done to blacks in a pure systematic fashion....from voting to police interaction this is real victimizing done by others and not some black woe is me crap!
